column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////As a kid I grew up with same style of Ramen
column2: that is cooked with an assortment of ingredients as they offer her at Jinya.  A fundamental and foundation of any soup is the broth and Jinya does a great job from the chicken
column4: vegetable and chicken/pork combinations. The additional ingredients; egg
column6: green onions and your choice of chicken and/or pork  coalescing into a wonderful and satisfying dish.
